about_the_game:
Cat Slaps is a fun and entertaining game born from the joy cats get from slapping objects. Use your paw to knock objects around and off tables in this delightful chaos! All you need is a keyboard to leap from table to table and a mouse to send objects tumbling to the floor. But is it just about slapping objects? No way!

DETAILED GAME FEATURES

  • Procedural Generation: No two table top disasters are the same!
  • 3D Physics Based Platforming: Jump, land, and slap with real physics, just like a true troublemaking cat.
  • Permadeath Roguelike: Nine lives? Think again! Stay on the table or start over
  • Object Cards: Choose wisely and shape your world with absurdly fun objects.
  • Crafting Cards: Combine objects and modifiers for purrfectly unpredictable effects!
  • Customization: Style your paws, because even chaos needs a personal touch.
  • Claws: Scratch and claw at objects to interact in new ways, because what’s a cat without claws?
  • High-Score System: The messier, the better. Can you become the ultimate chaos champion?

WHAT'S IN THE DEMO?

  • 🐾 Limited paw customization.
  • 🃏 Object and crafting cards.
  • ⚔️ Constrained mechanics.
  • 😺Tiny claws.
  • 🎲 A variety of objects to slap.

WHAT'S IN THE UPCOMING FULL RELEASE?

  • 🎨 Full customization for your cat’s paws and appearance.
  • 🃏 Wide spectrum object and crafting cards with new unique effects!
  • ⚔️ New mechanics and interactions.
  • 😼 Functional tiny claws, sharper and more mischievous than ever!
  • 🎲 A much wider variety of objects to slap, knock over, and interact with.

CUSTOMIZATION

Chubby paws customization is important! In the demo, your paw-shaping options are limited, but after the demo, a more feature-rich and fun character creation screen awaits you!

CRAFTING

Create different objects with new unique card combinations. Then, slap them too! Find out which new and different features work best for you. Of course, the full version will bring even more objects with updates!

A FRIEND

Oh, and this is Mr. Orange, the Card Trader.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-4100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 5850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 280 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible

short_description: A physics-based arcade platformer where you play as a mischievous cat in a world of infinite tables! Slap objects off the edge and craft wild combos! With a unique mix of procedural generation and deck-building mechanics, every run is a fresh journey to master the art of tabletop devastation!
